🚀 Hublead is the best Chrome extension to connect HubSpot and LinkedIn in 1-click.

💼 Import LinkedIn Contacts to HubSpot: Say goodbye to manual data entry. Effortlessly import LinkedIn contacts to HubSpot, ensuring clean, duplicate-free records.

📞 Sync LinkedIn Messages to HubSpot: Click on our buttons to sync any LinkedIn & Sales Navigator conversations such as InMails.

📧 HubSpot Data Enrichment: Find emails & phone numbers on LinkedIn Profiles thanks to our integrations with famous contact enrichment tools and our own email finder.

🔗 Connect HubSpot to LinkedIn: No more tab switching, view and edit HubSpot fields directly on LinkedIn.

🛠️ Simple Setup:
- Install our Chrome extension
- Connect LinkedIn to HubSpot in one click
- Start using our app to import LinkedIn contacts & log LinkedIn messages to HubSpot in 1-click

🆓 Connect HubSpot to LinkedIn for FREE
- Add unlimited contacts
- Sync messages & InMails
- Refresh contacts with LinkedIn info
- Find emails
- Add LinkedIn invitations
- Prospect's birthday notification
- Data enrichment integrations
